issue.title: [Python] Research CMake of C++ vs PyArrow
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16341](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16341). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Research two different build processes (C++ and PyArrow separately) and list the tasks that will need to be done in order to do the CMake changes to integrate C++ compilation for the `arrow/python` folder as part of the PyArrow build setup.
